ðŸ“– Summary: Maelstrom is a test runner that executes each test in its own container, providing isolation and eliminating dependency conflicts. It supports Rust, Go, and Python, offering drop-in replacements for standard test runners. Maelstrom can be run locally or distributed across a cluster for scalable testing.
